content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 0, West Ham United 0.

Foul by Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United).
Charlie Adam (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Charlie Adam (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

Håvard Nordtveit (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
